name: Cheeseburger
description: Ground beef patties topped with melted cheese in a bun

name: fries
description: Thinly sliced potato pieces that are deep-fried or air-fried

name: HotDog
description: Prepared using the intestines of animals like goats, sheep, etc., filled with specific material and is served in a long bun

name: FriedChicken
description: A crispy deep-fried dish of chicken is usually dipped in seasoned flour before frying

name: Pizza
description: A thin, flat round bread that is baked with vegetables and cheese on the top

name: Milkshake
description: A sweet, cold, and thick beverage traditionally made by blending milk, ice cream
